typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[],
		title as string,
		year as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(genres, title),
	mapColumn(
		cast,
		genres,
		title,
		year
	)) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['orders.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
